loanOfficer.name: Sarah Mitchell
loanOfficer.title: Mortgage Loan Officer
loanOfficer.bio: With over 10 years of experience in mortgage lending, Sarah is dedicated to helping families find the perfect home financing solution. Specializing in FHA, VA, and conventional loans.
certifications: National Association of Mortgage Brokers Member

testimonials.author: John Rodriguez
testimonials.text: Sarah made the entire process smooth and stress-free. Highly recommended!

testimonials.author: Maria Garcia
testimonials.text: Excellent communication and very knowledgeable about VA loans.

testimonials.author: David Chen
testimonials.text: Fast approval process and competitive rates. Will definitely work with Sarah again.

company.name: Summit Lending Group
company.about: Summit Lending Group is a full-service mortgage lender committed to providing competitive rates and personalized service to homebuyers across the nation. With a team of experienced professionals and a track record of excellence, we're here to help you achieve your homeownership dreams.

blogPosts.title: 5 Tips for First-Time Homebuyers
blogPosts.excerpt: Purchasing your first home can be overwhelming. Here are five essential tips to help you navigate the process.
blogPosts.author: Sarah Mitchell

blogPosts.title: Understanding FHA Loans in 2024
blogPosts.excerpt: FHA loans remain a popular choice for many homebuyers. Learn about the latest requirements and benefits.
blogPosts.author: Michael Thompson

blogPosts.title: How to Improve Your Credit Score Before Applying
blogPosts.excerpt: A higher credit score can save you thousands in interest. Here's how to boost yours before your application.
blogPosts.author: Jessica Anderson
